content.webTitle: The Web -- it's a spiritual thing

fields.headline: The Web -- it's a spiritual thing
fields.bodyText: It seems everyone thinks that sex is the number on topic on the Web, but it turns out that "more people use the Internet for religious or spiritual activities than have gambled online, used Web auctions sites, traded stocks online or used Internet-based dating services," according to the Pew Internet & American Life Project, reported here by CNet.
